name: Internalisation of the functional narrative of the Montado in the formulation, monitoring and evaluation of Rural Development policies
description: ECOPOL aims to contribute to the formulation, monitoring and evaluation of a Common Agricultural Policy (CAP) that is more adjusted to the reality of Mediterranean agroforestry systems, promoting collaboration and the transfer of knowledge between rural development agents, with a methodology based on the concepts of multifunctionality, ecosystem services (ES) and compensation of externalities.
